title: Do You Want To Fight?
body:
Do You Want To Fight?

Evan heard the sound of footsteps and water splashing and looked in the direction of the sound.

The sound of the footsteps was getting louder indicating the person was coming towards him. Because of the dense trees, he wasn't able to see who was coming.

Evan was ready to attack the moment he heard the sound of footsteps.

After ten more seconds, he finally saw a male and a female coming towards him.

Those two people also noticed Evan and stopped around thirty meters away from him.

When Evan saw the face of the female student he was surprised and raised his guard to the fullest.

"I did not expect to meet you so early," Evan said after Valery stopped.

Among all the students who took part in the exam, he knew he can't defeat Valery and Leon.

Even though he advanced to D+ rank he still can't beat a B rank hunter in the VR.

But even though Evan wasn't confident in beating her, he had enough confidence in running away.
